anti_patterns.name: Unused Patch File
anti_patterns.description: Patch file 'CVE-2025-22870.patch' exists in directory but is not referenced in spec
anti_patterns.recommendation: Add a reference to the patch file or remove it if not needed

anti_patterns.name: CVE Patch Mismatch
anti_patterns.description: Patch file 'CVE-2025-22870.patch' contains CVE reference but CVE-2025-22870 is not mentioned in spec
anti_patterns.recommendation: Add CVE-2025-22870 to the spec file changelog entry
